law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 261.375, 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 13, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 183, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 1. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 277, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: License required -- Renewal, records of transactions -- Violations -- License revocation or suspension -- Review by Franklin Circuit Court.
